definitions.definition: A twisted strand of fibre used for knitting or weaving .
Bundles of fibres twisted together, and which in turn are twisted in bundles to form strands , which in their turn are twisted or plaited to form rope .
A story , a tale , especially one that is incredible .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A twisted strand of fibre used for knitting or weaving .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) Bundles of fibres twisted together, and which in turn are twisted in bundles to form strands , which in their turn are twisted or plaited to form rope .
( countable ) A story , a tale , especially one that is incredible .
